objects.name: Alex
objects.text: Seems like it's almost finally time, huh?

objects.name: Artemis
objects.text: Of course. There's only fifteen minutes left before the trial.

objects.name: Alex
objects.text: You don't seem very nervous.

objects.name: Artemis
objects.text: Perhaps. Run me through the details again.

objects.name: Alex
objects.text: This is the criminal case for <color=#ff4d4d>Eduardo Fuentes</color>.

objects.name: Alex
objects.text: He is currently being charged for a <color=#ff4d4d>felony</color>, but our evidence suggests that this crime can be downgraded to a <color=#ff4d4d>misdemeanor</color>.

objects.name: Artemis
objects.text: Right. The prosecuting lawyer is the public prosecutor and our superior, <color=#ff4d4d>Felix Gwerder</color>.

objects.name: Alex
objects.text: It'll be tough. Even despite our client's background, Felix has an all-star witness.

objects.name: Artemis
objects.text: <color=#ff4d4d>GABRIEL HYLAND</color>? It's going to be tough to get the jury to dislike him. Could be problematic.

objects.name: Alex
objects.text: Wait, why do we need need the jury to dislike Gabriel?

objects.name: Artemis
objects.text: You have to remember that Eduardo was State Senator Hyland's bodyguard.

objects.name: Artemis
objects.text: I don't feel like State Senator Hyland wants to continue problematic affiliations. It would risk his future career in the Senate and the House.

objects.name: Alex
objects.text: Oh, he was once part of the New World Wrestling Federation.

objects.name: Artemis
objects.text: Exactly. NWW doesn't poll well with the voters in his district.

objects.name: Alex
objects.text: Hm. Seems like we have only five more minutes.

objects.name: Artemis
objects.text: Run through the witnesses that we have.

objects.name: Alex
objects.text: We have Gabriel, obviously.

objects.name: Alex
objects.text: We also have our defendant Eduardo, the IT guy KAI L. KIMURA, and we have the detective responsible for the murder case CONNOR BURKE.

objects.name: Artemis
objects.text: Okay. Seems like the Judge is almost ready. We should set up for the trial inside the courtroom.

objects.name: Connor
objects.text: Fine
